mutants.code:
def reverse_string(s):
    string_list = list(s)
    start = 1
    end = len(string_list) - 1
    while start < end:
        (string_list[start], string_list[end]) = (string_list[end], string_list[start])
        start += 1
        end -= 1
    reversed_string = ''.join(string_list)
    return reversed_string
